I don’t know how to implement this, if anyone can redirect me to a tutorial or knows the general concept of it, please let me know, your support will be greatly appreciated.

Thank you

What my Client.java says for what I am explaining:

if(k == 6) { loginMessage1 = "Client has been updated!"; loginMessage2 = "Please download our updated client."; return; }
I basically just want that to work when I make new clients, not sure how.
